content: crocheted autumn leaves are glued to a standard over-the-eyes mask make about 20 leaves or enough to cover mask as desired *fun for halloween or mardi gras lion brand * lion brand pattern # 70443ad skill level easy microspun article #910 1 ball crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm purchased mask craft glue available in different colorways 70443ad leaf mask 1 september 2007 *mango* 70444ad leaf mask 2 september 2007 *ebony* see also petal mask 3 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-leaf-mask-2 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-leaf-mask-3 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/petal-mask
